article_text:
PESHAWAR, Pakistan—It has been almost two years since singer Gulzar Alam, the master of classical Pashto music, performed in a public concert.

The wave of Islamic militancy that intensified in recent years, killing thousands of Pakistanis and hitting Mr. Alam's northwestern city of Peshawar particularly hard, also has proved devastating to the...

twitter.description: A wave of Islamic militancy that intensified in recent years, killing thousands of Pakistanis, also has proved devastating to a northwestern region's traditional—and unique—music culture.
twitter.title: Taliban Silence Pakistani Musicians

image.alt: Wave of Islamic militancy silences Pakistani musicians in northwestern region
